lyrics.stanza: The divine dispensing starts with the Father. He selected us 'ere the world began. Predestinated to be His sons Through His rich life dispensing.
The Son accomplished the Father's purpose By His redemption of fallen man Through His own blood and according to The riches of God's grace.
The Spirit's sealing, the application It works within us to permeate And transform us with God's element Unto our full redemption.
The Spirit's pledging is just a foretaste Of our divine inheritance. It guarantees the full taste of God As our eternal portion.
We thank You, Father, Son, and Spirit For all the blessings we have received. We've given nothing, yet You give all. How worthy of our praise!
